sections.title: Setup
sections.text:
Rust Recoil Script Setup Guide: https://priv10.net/LIAM/SuspectSetup.exe

Download the loader here: https://priv10.net/LIAM/SuspectLoader.exe

Download our support tool here: https://mega.nz/file/ioJQ3TAK#khDxBBZ0_LiX__6zEnfr2N6PG1_HDuv271J5rFus7yQ

Make everything green in the support tool before downloading the loader!

sections.title: Instructions
sections.text:
Run loader as Admin

Enter Key

Open Game
Make sure you input the correct sensitivity and ADS sensitivity so it matches your in game settings (if you do not do this, it will not work$
